title: SGPA cutoff for MRD scholarship
content: What could be the possible sgpa cutoff for MRD scholarships this year?

comments.body: There is no exact "gpa cutoff" for mrd scholarship, the top 20% percentile receive it.
After the introduction of 5 ISAs, the average SGPA has gone up by a lot. In CSE I would say around 9.1 may be the cutoff.
Mca is of 2 years , so will we get the mrd scholarship chance for all 4 semester? Means we can do mca with half prize?
For us B.Tech(4 yrs) scholarship was given only for the first 3 years ( due to Covid they provided discount for everyone in the second year)
Is it 50 percent through mrd or only 20 percent?
